actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to require that the Center for Substance Abuse Treatment carry out treatment programs for adolescents.
short_title: Substance Abuse Treatment for Adolescents Act
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
Federal aid to substance abuse programs

summary.text: Substance Abuse Treatment for Adolescents Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require that a minimum percentage or amount of funds appropriated under provisions relating to the Center for Substance Abuse Treatment be used for adolescent specific substance abuse treatment programs, including the provision of services and the conduct of evaluations and research on the effects of the services.

titles.title: Substance Abuse Treatment for Adolescents Act
A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to require that the Center for Substance Abuse Treatment carry out treatment programs for adolescents.
